metadata.name: Hit Counter by nancex
metadata.description:
Features: - Displays a counter for total hits taken in the run under HUD stats. - Icon changes based on the number of hits taken.
TO-DO (maybe?): - Add configuration options. - Kills player if hit count exceeds a certain threshold (configurable).
This is my first mod, so please be gentle with feedback. I hope you find it useful!
Special thanks to @Peachee, whose Planetarium Chance mod served as a great reference.
